channel.title: Teleporting menu - help fixing the code

item.title: Teleporting menu - help fixing the code
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

ok i’ve starter, not to sure if its right, but so far it pulls up a menu with the word of the place. Now I am trying to make it where when I click the words it teleports me, heres what ive got for the pk menu.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkmenu") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@PK Menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@whi@Single Territory Pking", 8145); sendQuest("@whi@Drags", 8146); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }
Then I took the number beside the “drags” word (8146) and made a case of it, or tried too.

case 8146: // Pk menu - Green Drags c.closeAll(); c.toX = 2978; c.toY = 3616; break;
However now the word drags doesn’t show up and I don’t think i could click it even if it showed up, help please=(

Read full topic
item.source: Teleporting menu - help fixing the code
